title: No, Man Who Slapped Hardik Patel Was Not Seen With Rahul Gandhi
subtitle: A viral post claiming that the attack on Hardik Patil was scripted by the Congress by comparing the picture of the attacker with a picture of Rahul Gandhi with the person alleged to be the attacker in the background .
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral post claiming that the attack on Hardik Patel, on Friday, 19 April, was scripted by the Congress is doing the rounds on social media.

The post juxtaposed a picture of the attacker slapping Patel with a picture of Rahul Gandhi purportedly with the same attacker.
